Text: Thanks bro as always. I can not get the Smithsonian page to open. All I get is a gray page.

Well gee, this is what the intertubes is all about. Thanks so much for the work you've done to make great music available.
This is as it should be. I'm quite sure that these artists would have wished in their lifetimes to be heard without regard to whether some corporation could profit from it long after they were gone.
Thanks again.
(It will take me weeks to get through your collection.)
